page.title: 09Education in Woodhalls
page.content: Few children in the area receive pre - school education but playgroup facilities are available at Hatherleigh and Okehampton.For Primary School education the area is divided between Hatherleigh and Exbourne. The larger school is in the nearby market town and the small village school of 3O pupils is in Exbourne.No transport is provided to take children to school which means that parents have to take and fetch them morning and evening. Secondary education is catered for at Okehampton.(A couple of children go to private schools).A bus is provided to take the secondary children to school as it is 5 miles away. In the days before the ubiquitous motor car most country children had long walks to school.
